DialogueNode.text: Hey can you do something for me?
I lost my great-grandfathers gold coin somewhere out near the lake.
I would go look for it, but with the increase in monster attacks lately...

DialogueOption.text: What do I get out of it?
Why were you by the lake alone? Isn't it dangerous?

DialogueNode.text: You will make an old man very happy.
If that isn't enough for you, perhaps I can have a nice homecooked meal ready for you upon your return.
I was not alone. Pup came with me, and it was before the most recent attacks.
Oh you are busy? Maybe another time then.
I will have a meal ready for you when you return with my great-grandfather's gold coin!
Do you have the gold coin?

DialogueOption.text: I found it, here you go. [Give Gold Coin]
I couldn't find it, sorry. [Keep Gold Coin]

DialogueNode.text: Thank you so much! It really means a lot to me that you went and found it!
I know you don't have a lot of time to sit and eat, so I made you this.
I understand. It was a lot to ask of you.
I guess me and Pup will head out to have a look for it.
Okay, let me know when you find it.
Come on Pup, we are going on an adventure.
